meanings.definition: The quality or state of being jejune.
meanings.sent1: The jejuneness of the meal left us all hungry.
meanings.sent2: The jejuneness of the conversation made it hard to stay interested.
meanings.sent3: The jejuneness of the party decorations made everyone yawn.
meanings.sent4: The jejuneness of the landscape mirrored the emptiness in his heart.
meanings.sent5: The jejuneness of the music drained all energy from the room.

meanings.sent1: The salad was so jejuneness that no one wanted seconds.
meanings.sent2: The movie was criticized for its jejuneness plot.
meanings.sent3: His joke fell flat due to its jejuneness humor.
meanings.sent4: The painting's colors were so jejuneness, they failed to evoke any emotion.
meanings.sent5: The book's ending was disappointingly jejuneness, leaving readers unsatisfied.
